lead_paragraph: Laila Ali said she expected her father, Muhammad Ali, to watch her fight next week at Madison Square Garden, site of some of his most memorable bouts. Ali will defend her W.B.C. super middleweight title against No. 3-ranked Shelley Burton on the Nov. 11 undercard of the I.B.F. heavyweight bout between champion Wladimir Klitschko and Calvin Brock. Ali will make her Madison Square Garden debut 35 years after her father lost to Joe Frazier there.
